verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they drew \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Bethphage|strong="G0967"\w*, \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* of \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*, \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the village|strong="G2968"\+w* \+w over against|strong="G0561"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w straightway|strong="G2112"\+w* \+w ye shall find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w an ass|strong="G3688"\+w* \+w tied|strong="G1210"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w a colt|strong="G4454"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w her|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w loose|strong="G3089"\+w* \+add them\+add*, \+w and bring|strong="G0071"\+w* \+add them\+add* \+w unto me|strong="G3427"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w any|strong="G5100"\+w* \+add man\+add* \+w say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w ought|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w ye shall say|strong="G2046"\+w*, \+w The Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w need|strong="G5532"\+w* \+w of them|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w straightway|strong="G2112"\+w* \+w he will send|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w All|strong="G3650"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* was \w done|strong="G1096"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* which was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

Tell \w ye|strong="G2036"\w* the \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w* of \w Sion|strong="G4622"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w meek|strong="G4239"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sitting|strong="G1910"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* an \w ass|strong="G3688"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w colt|strong="G4454"\w* the \w foal|strong="G5207"\w* of an \w ass|strong="G5268"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w commanded|strong="G4367"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*,

And \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* the \w ass|strong="G3688"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w colt|strong="G4454"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G2007"\w* \w on|strong="G1883"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w set|strong="G1940"\w* \add him\add* \w thereon|strong="G1883"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G3793"\w* very \w great|strong="G4118"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w spread|strong="G4766"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*; \w others|strong="G0243"\w* cut \w down|strong="G2875"\w* \w branches|strong="G2798"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w trees|strong="G1186"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strawed|strong="G4766"\w* \add them\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w multitudes|strong="G3793"\w* that went \w before|strong="G4254"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w followed|strong="G0190"\w*, \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Hosanna|strong="G5614"\w* to the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*: \w Blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \add is\add* he that \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w Hosanna|strong="G5614"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w highest|strong="G5310"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1525"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* was \w moved|strong="G4579"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them that \w sold|strong="G4453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bought|strong="G0059"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w overthrew|strong="G2690"\w* the \w tables|strong="G5132"\w* of the \w moneychangers|strong="G2855"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w seats|strong="G2515"\w* of them that \w sold|strong="G4453"\w* \w doves|strong="G4058"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w It is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w My|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w shall be called|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w of prayer|strong="G4335"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w have made|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w a den|strong="G4693"\+w* \+w of thieves|strong="G3027"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w blind|strong="G5185"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w lame|strong="G5560"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the wonderful \w things|strong="G2297"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* he \w did|strong="G4160"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w children|strong="G3816"\w* \w crying|strong="G2896"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Hosanna|strong="G5614"\w* to the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*; they were sore \w displeased|strong="G0023"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Hearest \w thou|strong="G0191"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Yea|strong="G3483"\+w*; \+w have ye|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3763"\+w* \+w read|strong="G0314"\+w*, \+w Out|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w of the mouth|strong="G4750"\+w* \+w of babes|strong="G3516"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sucklings|strong="G2337"\+w* \+w thou hast perfected|strong="G2675"\+w* \+w praise|strong="G0136"\+w*?\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1854"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w lodged|strong="G0835"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*.
\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* in the \w morning|strong="G4405"\w* as he \w returned|strong="G1877"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, he \w hungered|strong="G3983"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w a|strong="G1520"\w* fig \w tree|strong="G4808"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w thereon|strong="G1722"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w leaves|strong="G5444"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Let|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3371"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w grow|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w henceforward for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G0165"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w presently|strong="G3916"\w* the fig \w tree|strong="G4808"\w* withered \w away|strong="G3583"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, they \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w soon|strong="G3916"\w* \w is|strong="G3583"\w* the fig \w tree|strong="G4808"\w* withered \w away|strong="G3583"\w*!

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w doubt|strong="G1252"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*, \+w ye shall|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w only|strong="G3440"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3588"\+w* \+add which is done\+add* \+w to the fig tree|strong="G4808"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w also if|strong="G2579"\+w* \+w ye shall say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G3735"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w mountain|strong="G3735"\+w*, \+w Be thou removed|strong="G0142"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be thou cast|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the sea|strong="G2281"\+w*; \+w it shall be done|strong="G1096"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w*, \+w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w ye shall ask|strong="G0154"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w prayer|strong="G4335"\+w*, \+w believing|strong="G4100"\+w*, \+w ye shall receive|strong="G2983"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2064"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* as he was \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* doest \w thou|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*? \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I also|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w will ask|strong="G2065"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w thing|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye tell|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*, \+w I in like wise|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w will tell|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w I do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w The baptism|strong="G0908"\+w* \+w of John|strong="G2491"\+w*, \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w was it|strong="G2258"\+w*? \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w*?\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w reasoned|strong="G1260"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* we shall \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w From|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; he will \w say|strong="G2046"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* did \w ye|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we shall \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*; we \w fear|strong="G5399"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w hold|strong="G2192"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w We|strong="G1492"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w tell|strong="G1492"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w I do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w think|strong="G1380"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5213"\+w*? \+w A certain man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w had|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w two|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w sons|strong="G5043"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he came|strong="G4334"\+w* \+w to the first|strong="G4413"\+w*, \+w and said|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w Son|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2038"\+w* \+w to day|strong="G4594"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w He answered|strong="G0611"\+w* \+w and said|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w I will|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w afterward|strong="G5305"\+w* \+w he repented|strong="G3338"\+w*, \+w and went|strong="G0565"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he came|strong="G4334"\+w* \+w to the second|strong="G1208"\+w*, \+w and said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w likewise|strong="G5615"\+w*. \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he answered|strong="G0611"\+w* \+w and said|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+add go\+add*, \+w sir|strong="G2962"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w went|strong="G0565"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Whether|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w them twain|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w did|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the will|strong="G2307"\+w* \+w of his father|strong="G3962"\+w*?\wj* They \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, The \w first|strong="G4413"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the publicans|strong="G5057"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the harlots|strong="G4204"\+w* \+w go|strong="G4254"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w before|strong="G4254"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w* \+w came|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the way|strong="G3598"\+w* \+w of righteousness|strong="G1343"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye believed|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the publicans|strong="G5057"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the harlots|strong="G4204"\+w* \+w believed|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w*, \+w when ye had seen|strong="G1492"\+w* \+add it\+add*, \+w repented|strong="G3338"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w afterward|strong="G5305"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w ye might believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w Hear|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w parable|strong="G3850"\+w*: \+w There was|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w a certain|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w householder|strong="G3617"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w planted|strong="G5452"\+w* \+w a vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w hedged|strong="G5418"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w round about|strong="G4060"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w digged|strong="G3736"\+w* \+w a winepress|strong="G3025"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w built|strong="G3618"\+w* \+w a tower|strong="G4444"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w let|strong="G1554"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1554"\+w* \+w to husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w went into a far country|strong="G0589"\+w*:\wj*
